table.cell: PROJECTED DATE OF RELEASE FROM PROBATION:${supervisionEndDateStr}

cell.font: The goals and tasks outlined in this plan are designed to help resolve issues that led to your involvement with the juvenile justice system and to ensure the safety, permanency, and well being of your family. You will be expected to participate in developing this case plan and demonstrate progress in achieving the goals listed. Your progress will be reviewed and evaluated. In addition to the activities outlined in the case plan, you are expected to adhere to all court ordered conditions of probation.
List all services previously provided to help the child and family.

table-row.cell: TITLE IV-E CANDIDACY: Please indicate below the tool or documentation that was used to determine if the juvenile is currently a candidate for foster care. The risk assessment must be one of the tools used, but may not be the only tool used.

_if_( ${juvFosterCareCandidateStr} == "Yes" )
_else_
_endif_ Juvenile IS a foster care candidate. Based on the above information this juvenile has been determined to be (or continues to be) at imminent risk of removal from the home and placement into foster care , absent preventative pre-placement intervention services. If the services described in the following casplan (particularly in the medical, safety/security, emotional/mental health, and family services domains) are not effective, the plan will be removal of the juvenile from his/her home with placement into foster care.
Describe below the current risk factors which place the juvenile at imminent risk of removal and placement into foster care
${titleIVEComment}

cell.font:
_if_( ${juvFosterCareCandidateStr} == "No" )
_else_
_endif_ Juvenile IS NOT currently a foster care candidate
Explain why this child requires placement. Discuss the child's behavior AND the family situation.
Explain what specific services are being provided to safely meet the child's needs as discussed in the previous section.
If the child is placed outside of Texas , explain why this is in the best interest of the child. (Refer to TJPC Policy #4).
Plan for the safe and permanent placement of the child.

cell.i: *If emancipation/independent living or other permanent living arrangement is the permanency plan, explain why this is the best interest of the child

MEDICAL/DENTAL DOMAIN

(prior to placement)

table-row.cell: Date child's educational records were provided to caregiver:${juvenileLatestSchoolHistory.createDate}

table-header.cell: LEVEL OF SUPERVISION & PLAN OF CONTACT

cell.font: B. The current plan of contact between the child and JPO is as follows(document frequency & method): one face to face visit each week, one monthly workshop and one phone call each week.

table-row.cell: Along with the right to visit your child, you have the right to be notified of any change in the placement of your child.
You have the right to discuss any changes made in the placement of your child and the right to discuss this with the JPO's supervisor if you feel your concerns have not been addressed.

You have the right to know the plan of action necessary to have your child returned to you, and you have the responsibility to follow that plan in order to correct the circumstances which required the placement of your child in substitute care.
You have the right to be notified of any unusual occurrence regarding your child such as injury, illness, runaway, etc.

You have the right to be notified of any child facility staffing, placement review, or administrative hearing, which has the potential for impacting the return of your child. In addition, you have the responsibility to attend these staffings/reviews and participate in the development of the plan of action.
While your child is in placement, you have the right to have the situation reviewed at least every six months to ensure that appropriate treatment is being provided.

CHILD: _foreach_(ack ${previousAcknowledgements} 'even' 'odd') _if_( ${ackIdx} == 0 ) _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'JUVENILE SIGNED' ) SIGNED _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'JUVENILE REFUSED TO SIGN' ) JUVENILE REFUSED TO SIGN _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'JUVENILE SIGNATURE NOT APPLICABLE' ) NOT APPLICABLE _endif_ _endif_ _endfor_

FAMILY: _foreach_(ack ${previousAcknowledgements} 'even' 'odd') _if_( ${ackIdx} != 0 ) _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'GUARDIAN SIGNED' ) SIGNED _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'GUARDIAN REFUSED TO SIGN' ) GUARDIAN REFUSED TO SIGN _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'NOT AVAILABLE FOR GUARDIAN SIGNATURE' ) NOT AVAILABLE FOR GUARDIAN SIGNATURE _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'GUARDIAN SIGNATURE NOT APPLICABLE' ) NOT APPLICABLE _endif_ _endif_ _endfor_

_if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'JUVENILE SIGNED' ) SIGNED _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'JUVENILE REFUSED TO SIGN' ) JUVENILE REFUSED TO SIGN _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'JUVENILE SIGNATURE NOT APPLICABLE' ) NOT APPLICABLE _endif_ _endif_ _endfor_

FAMILY: _foreach_(ack ${previousAcknowledgements} 'even' 'odd') _if_( ${ackIdx} != 0 )
_if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'GUARDIAN SIGNED' ) SIGNED _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'GUARDIAN REFUSED TO SIGN' ) GUARDIAN REFUSED TO SIGN _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'NOT AVAILABLE FOR GUARDIAN SIGNATURE' ) NOT AVAILABLE FOR GUARDIAN SIGNATURE _endif_ _if_( ${ack.signatureStatus} == 'GUARDIAN SIGNATURE NOT APPLICABLE' ) NOT APPLICABLE _endif_ _endif_ _endfor_
